entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -28.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.6°C
Wind: NW 20 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
